block lp < 50
	 EndWindow "\n\n\n\n@c你的生命值不足50"

block
	KillItem 69118,1
	setlp -50
	Play_SE 210,320,240
	Play_SE 218,320,240
	giveLeak1Item (71034%15$1,71037%15$1,71040%15$1,71043%15$1,71046%15$1,71033%15$1,71036%15$1,71039%15$1,71042%15$1,71045%15$1,71032%5$1,71035%5$1,71038%5$1,71041%5$1,71044%5$1)
endblock
